channel.title: Webclient Help
channel.description:
ok, i am trying to make a web client for my 718, i have the whole thing setup, ive made my .jar and got my html code. Here is the problem : http://prntscr.com/t6pry
Here is my html code: [code=cpp]<html> <body> <body bgcolor="black"> <title>Apocraphy Webclient</title> <applet name=client width=100% height=100% archive='Link Goes Here' code='Loader.class'> </applet> </body> </html>[/code]
If you'd like to help me manually, i have teamviewer and skype and you could maybe teach me. Thank you.
Skype: Rspsdesigner
